Message:
The power of a witch is
influenced by her emotions.

Powers can manifest
from happiness and joy,

but something more powerful
is evoked from pain and sadness.

We have many
“treasures” in our lives—

the time we spend
enjoying meals with family,

being near the people
important to us...

but if we were to lose
even one of them,

But what if there was
someone who only had
one of those “treasures?”

Once it’s gone,
how much agony would
that person suffer?

The Kingdom of Byrune
was destroyed by a Curse—

one that turns everything to rust.
A curse of a love gone
completely berserk.
